  • Uses of InstanceResource in com.janeirodigital.shapetrees.core.resources

    Subclasses of InstanceResource in com.janeirodigital.shapetrees.core.resources
    Modifier and Type
    Class
    Description
    class 
    ManageableResource
    A ManageableResource represents a regular resource that could be managed by one or more shape trees.
    class 
    ManagedResource
    A ManagedResource indicates that a given ManageableResource is managed by a shape tree.
    class 
    ManagerResource
    A ManagerResource represents a resource that is associated with a regular MangeableResource, and contains metadata in the form of a ShapeTreeManager that assigns one or more shape trees to the associated ManageableResource.
    class 
    MissingManageableResource
    A MissingManageableResource represents a state where a given ManageableResource at a URL does not exist.
    class 
    MissingManagerResource
    A MissingManagerResource represents a state where a given ManagerResource at a URL does not exist.
    class 
    UnmanagedResource
    An UnmanagedResource indicates that a given ManageableResource is not managed by a shape tree.
    Methods in com.janeirodigital.shapetrees.core.resources that return InstanceResource
    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description

    ResourceAccessor.createResource(ShapeTreeContext context, URL resourceUrl, ResourceAttributes headers, String body, String contentType)
    Creates a specific InstanceResource identified by the provided resourceUrl.
    InstanceResource
    ResourceAccessor.getResource(ShapeTreeContext context, URL resourceUrl)
    Gets a specific InstanceResource identified by the provided resourceUrl.
